aboutScreen.description: MatchMate is your ultimate companion for finding and joining sports activities in your area. Whether you're a basketball, soccer, or volleyball enthusiast, MatchMate connects you with local games and teams. Book stadium slots, generate QR codes for entry, and track your sports activities in one place.

features.joinTeams: • Join teams and play sports: Find and join teams to play basketball, soccer, volleyball, and more with people in your area.
features.bookSlots: • Book stadium slots: Easily book available slots at local stadiums directly through the app.
features.generateQR: • Generate QR codes: Get a QR code for your bookings to ease your stadium entry.
features.profileManagement: • Profile management: View and manage your profile, including personal information and sports preferences.
features.gameHistory: • Game history: Track all the games you’ve played with detailed history and statistics.
features.userReviews: • User reviews: Read and write reviews about players and games, contributing to a trusted community.
features.leaderboard: • Leaderboard: Discover the most active players with our leaderboard, showing top players based on games played.
